catalog_info.title: Genomic Data Manipulation
catalog_info.notes: Weekly 90-minute lab. Offered jointly with the School of Public Health as BIO508.
catalog_info.description: Introduction to genomic data, computational methods for interpreting these data, and survey of current functional genomics research. Covers biological data processing, programming for large datasets, high-throughput data (sequencing, proteomics, expression, etc.), and related publications.
